item.title: RT by @scifilondon: We're excited to share the CFP for "SF & Extraction," the 6th annual @LSFRC_ conference, 6-8 October 2022! How does science fiction build new worlds beyond extractivism that take the possibilities of extinction seriously? http://www.ccl.bbk.ac.uk/sf-extraction-conference-cfp/
item.dc:creator: @ccl_bbk
item.description: We're excited to share the CFP for "SF & Extraction," the 6th annual @LSFRC_ conference, 6-8 October 2022! How does science fiction build new worlds beyond extractivism that take the possibilities of extinction seriously? ccl.bbk.ac.uk/sf-extraction-‚Ä¶

item.title:
RT by @scifilondon: Next weekend marks the 40th anniversary of both "Blade Runner" and "The Thing", movies that bombed with critics and audiences when they were released, but were subsequently reclaimed.
At @EscapistMag, I wonder if such a rehabilitation could happen today?
https://www.escapistmagazine.com/blade-runner-the-thing-bombed-cult-reclaimed-masterpiece-internet-age/
item.dc:creator: @Darren_Mooney
item.description:
Next weekend marks the 40th anniversary of both "Blade Runner" and "The Thing", movies that bombed with critics and audiences when they were released, but were subsequently reclaimed.

At @EscapistMag, I wonder if such a rehabilitation could happen today?

escapistmagazine.com/blade-r‚Ä¶

item.title: RT by @scifilondon: The benifit of doing festivals as a film reviewer is simple. A lot of the hard work has already been done. When seeing films at @scifilondon or #sundancelondon your not looking for bad films. its simply not true. post 40 theres an articulate element of 'Two hours I wont get back'
item.dc:creator: @RobDeb
item.description: The benifit of doing festivals as a film reviewer is simple. A lot of the hard work has already been done. When seeing films at @scifilondon or #sundancelondon your not looking for bad films. its simply not true. post 40 theres an articulate element of 'Two hours I wont get back'

item.title: RT by @scifilondon: Manfish is coming to Kingston! part of the @KIFFESTUK On the 25th June screening at 10am not sure why double festival winner ! @scifilondon & @romfordhorror Deserves a better slot? item.title: RT by @scifilondon: First of our *three* summer 2022 events was the hugely enjoyable Big Jubilee Lunch hosted by @DunstanSt Missed it? Catch us on July 3 on the Victoria Park Bandstand @VickyParkFriend @TowerHamletsNow
item.dc:creator: @elcb_social

item.title: RT by @scifilondon: Very much much looking forward to this exciting discussion on RIGHTS TO NATURE with @shrishtee, @jeremie_gilbert, @RKillean, @c_terwindt and @fhabekuss at >@silbersalzhalle. Join us ON-SITE or via LIVE STREAM: 18.6.22, 6-7.30 pm (Berlin time), Ulrichskirche, Halle (Saale), Germany
item.dc:creator: @agnesofischer

item.title: RT by @scifilondon: Our fest dir @SimonRFoster1 joins @GarenDaly from @BostonSciFi and Marta Calderon fro @scifilondon to talk The Most Anticipated Films of the US Summer. https://youtu.be/KU9y1ogqsJY .
